alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 22 at 9:32PM CDT until May 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Henderson, Lee, Des Moines and Hancock Counties. Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Henderson and Des Moines Counties. Mississippi River at Keithsburg affecting Louisa, Henderson, Des Moines and Mercer Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 10.8 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday morning and continue falling to 8.8 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning.
